author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA'S CORE NOW MOVING OVER BERMUDA WHERE HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED INTO THE MORNING...
summary: ...IMELDA'S CORE NOW MOVING OVER BERMUDA WHERE HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED INTO THE MORNING... As of 11:00 PM AST Wed Oct 01 the center of Imelda was located near 32.1, -65.0 with movement ENE at 29 mph. The minimum central pressure was 971 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
